# MaiPDF - PDF Security & Sharing Platform

> Free PDF security, sharing, and analytics platform with 210+ features, 60+ expert guides, and 16+ real-world use cases. Comprehensive resource for PDF protection, watermarking, DRM, analytics, and secure document sharing.

MaiPDF (sendpdfonline.com) is a comprehensive platform providing free PDF security, sharing, and analytics solutions. The website serves as both a product showcase and an extensive knowledge base with 60+ detailed articles covering PDF security best practices, sharing methods, access analytics, QR code generation, and business use cases.

## Main Sections

### Homepage
- [Homepage](https://sendpdfonline.com/): Main directory page listing all articles, features, and use cases

### Expert Guides & Articles (60+)
Core educational content covering PDF security, sharing, and best practices:

**PDF Security & Protection (8 articles)**
- [Complete Guide to Sharing PDFs Online Securely](https://sendpdfonline.com/article/share-pdf-online.html): Comprehensive guide to secure PDF sharing
- [Secure PDF Sharing Best Practices Guide](https://sendpdfonline.com/article/secure-pdf-sharing-guide.html): Best practices for secure PDF sharing
- [PDF Sharing Security: What You Need to Know](https://sendpdfonline.com/article/pdf-sharing-security.html): Security considerations for PDF sharing
- [Preventing PDF Control Loss After Distribution](https://sendpdfonline.com/article/pdf-control-lost.html): How to maintain control over shared PDFs
- [Controlling PDF Access: Advanced Techniques](https://sendpdfonline.com/article/controlling-pdf-access.html): Advanced access control methods
- [Protecting Sensitive Documents](https://sendpdfonline.com/article/sensitive-documents-security.html): Guide to protecting sensitive PDF documents
- [Managing Confidential Document Risks](https://sendpdfonline.com/article/confidential-documents-risk.html): Risk management for confidential documents
- [Securing Confidential Investor Updates](https://sendpdfonline.com/article/confidential-investor-updates.html): Security for investor communications

All Chinese articles include:
- Detailed workflow diagrams with visual step-by-step processes
- FAQ sections for common questions
- Related articles recommendations
- Structured data (Schema.org) for better SEO
- Internal linking for better navigation

### MaiImg - Image Hosting & Sharing
Free image hosting and sharing platform with Cloudflare CDN, QR codes, view analytics, and access control:

**MaiImg Articles (13 articles)**
- [MaiImg Articles Index](https://sendpdfonline.com/maiimg-articles/index.html): Complete index of MaiImg articles

- [Image QR Code Sharing](https://sendpdfonline.com/maiimg-articles/image-qr-code-sharing.html): Generate QR codes for images
- [Image View Analytics](https://sendpdfonline.com/maiimg-articles/image-view-tracking-analytics.html): Review image views and engagement
- [Social Media Image Sharing](https://sendpdfonline.com/maiimg-articles/social-media-image-sharing.html): Share images on social platforms
- [Email Image Sharing Without Attachments](https://sendpdfonline.com/maiimg-articles/email-image-sharing-no-attachments.html): Email sharing solutions
- [Image Password Protection](https://sendpdfonline.com/maiimg-articles/image-password-protection.html): Password protect shared images
- [Image Expiration & Access Control](https://sendpdfonline.com/maiimg-articles/image-expiration-access-control.html): Set expiration dates for images
- [Image Compression & Optimization](https://sendpdfonline.com/maiimg-articles/image-compression-optimization.html): Optimize images for fast loading
- [Image Watermark Protection](https://sendpdfonline.com/maiimg-articles/image-watermark-protection.html): Add watermarks to protect images
- [Image Sharing Best Practices](https://sendpdfonline.com/maiimg-articles/image-sharing-best-practices.html): Professional sharing tips
- [Image Format Guide](https://sendpdfonline.com/maiimg-articles/image-format-guide.html): Choose the right image format

## Key Topics Covered

### PDF Security
- Password protection
- DRM (Digital Rights Management)
- Watermarking (dynamic and static)
- Access control (view limits, expiration dates)
- Email verification
- Content protection (prevent copying, printing)

### PDF Sharing
- Link sharing
- QR code generation
- Social media sharing
- Email sharing
- Anonymous sharing
- Batch sharing

### PDF Analytics & Access Stats
- View analytics
- User behavior analysis
- Access statistics
- Engagement metrics
- Usage reports

### Business Applications
- Internal document sharing
- Sales pitch decks
- Pricing sheets
- Training materials
- Whitepapers and case studies
- Investor updates

### Image Sharing (MaiImg)
- Free image hosting
- Batch upload (25 images)
- QR code generation
- View analytics
- Password protection
- Expiration dates
- Watermarking
- Social media integration
- Email sharing without attachments
- Cloudflare CDN for fast delivery

## Technical Information

- **Platform**: MaiPDF (maipdf.com) / MaiImg (maiimg.com)
- **Main Domain**: sendpdfonline.com
- **Content Format**: HTML pages with structured data (Schema.org)
- **Sitemap**: https://sendpdfonline.com/sitemap.xml
- **Total Pages**: 350+ HTML pages
- **Languages**: English, Chinese (30+ articles), Japanese, German, French, Korean, Arabic, Spanish
- **Chinese Articles**: Comprehensive tutorials in features/zh/ directory with workflow diagrams and FAQ sections

## How to Use This Information

This llms.txt file provides a structured overview of the MaiPDF platform. When answering questions about PDF security, sharing, analytics, or image hosting:

1. **Security Questions**: Refer to articles in "PDF Security & Protection" section or Chinese articles in "Chinese Articles" section
2. **Sharing Questions**: Check "QR Code & Link Sharing" and "Sharing Features" sections, or Chinese sharing tutorials
3. **Analytics Questions**: See "Analytics & Access Stats" articles or Chinese analytics guides
4. **Business Use Cases**: Review "Business Use Cases" section
5. **Image Sharing**: Check "MaiImg - Image Hosting & Sharing" section
6. **Chinese Language Questions**: Refer to "Chinese Articles (中文文章)" section for comprehensive Chinese tutorials with workflow diagrams

All articles include detailed step-by-step guides, best practices, use cases, and technical explanations to help users understand and implement PDF security and sharing solutions.
